This family-friendly Can Tho hotel is located on a river, within 3 mi (5 km) of Can Tho Harbour, Cai Khe Trade Center and Ho Chi Minh Museum. Can Tho Museum and Ong Pagoda are also within 3 mi (5 km). Van Phat 1 Hotel offers an airport shuttle (available on request). You can indulge in massages or body treatments, and Con Khuong BBQ, one of 2 restaurants, serves Vietnamese cuisine and is open for lunch and dinner. There's an outdoor pool and a bar/lounge, and rooms get the details right with bathrobes and slippers. Van Phat Riverside Hotel is conveniently located in the popular New Quay / Riverside area. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the hotel are Wi-Fi in public areas, meeting facilities, business center, room service, elevator. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of tennis courts, games room, jacuzzi, spa, fitness center. Convenience and comfort makes Van Phat Riverside Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Can Tho. 2 restaurants, an outdoor pool, and a fitness center are available at this hotel. Free buffet breakfast, free WiFi in public areas, and free self parking are also provided. Other amenities include a bar/lounge, a 24-hour business center, and meeting rooms. 
Putting on a pure white, Nesta Hotel like an outstanding trait from the Hau riverside. Nesta Can tho is located on the old ferry of Cantho, but it is very luxury and modern. When you stay here, you are really mixed with a quiet atmosphere, enjoy the fresh breeze, make yourself comfortable when watching the gentle river. You will become separated from noises, leave all tiredness from the center of Mekong delta. At night, you will marvel at the shimmery beauty of Cantho brigde â€“ a longest cable stayed brigde of Asean. Moreover, Nesta is near the city center, it is very convenient for your exploration.
